name: Felix Chunks In Jelly Chicken 400G
description: Complete pet food for adult cats.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>Feeding Guide: For average adult cats between 3-5 kg, feed 1/2-1 can per day, preferably in 2 separate meals. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available. The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: Meat and Animal Derivatives (of which Chicken 14%)
PromotionDescription: £10 to spend in the pet aisle when you take out a Pet Insurance policy
